title: He, She, They
overview: He, She, They follows Rafa, a young 18 year old, pansexual and non-binarie who decides to leave her family in the interior of SÃ£o Paulo and move to the house of her cousin, Vini, in the capital. Vini, who already shares the space with Maia, is surprised to discover that Rafa identifies himself with the neutral pronoun and not with the female or male gender.
